name: Jack and Shelby
description:
Welcome to the adventures of Jack and Shelby, a twist on the story of the Tortoise and the Hare!

Follow Jack and Shelby as they complete various puzzles and try to escape to the ocean together.

*NOTE: This game requires 2 controllers to play! Apart from the main menu screen, Keyboard and mouse is not currently a supported way to play the game*

Created over 2 days for Kiwijam 2022 by:

Sam Thompson

Dominik Lange

Alex Whitmarsh

Jasmine Weaver

Luke Thompson

Connor Greer

Lucas RiedlShah

Sam Reedy

James Aston
